shortDescription: A vulnerability in NuPoint Messenger (NPM) of Mitel MiCollab through 9.8.0.33 allows an unauthenticated attacker to conduct a SQL injection attack due to insufficient sanitization of user input. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to access sensitive information and execute arbitrary database and management operations.
vulnerabilityName: Mitel MiCollab NuPoint Messenger (NPM) SQL Injection Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
